name: Trigonometry Impossible Aggrandize Pong – Play the Interesting Classic Game!
name_original: Trigonometry Impossible Aggrandize Pong – Play the Interesting Classic Game!
description:
Trigonometry Impossible Aggrandize Pong
----------------------------------------------------------
A modern touch to the classical game to compete revolutionizing game world.

The game is simple you need to keep the figure in the circle by changing the direction of the bar rotating along circumference of the circle by a simple tap

Beat the highest score of yours and challenge your friends

Download now Trigonometry Impossible Aggrandize Pong for free.
